attributes.additional_details:
Every country like Canada and United States has national day but what about the UK.

We the British people don't have a national day like Denmark and it be great to have Britishness so we can be patriots to celebrate and show the world that we need to have British national day.

And we would have like parades, street parties, everything so everybody can have a good time and patriotism and waving the Union Jack flags.

I think United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland should finally have national day.
